about_the_game:
Embark on an epic escape adventure in "Pixi Poxi," a game that will push the boundaries of your gaming skills. Assume the role of Pixi, a courageous test subject. Your mission: to break free from the clutches of the crazy scientist, Poxi, and reclaim your lost humanity.

Try the first 10 levels in this demo!
detailed_description:
Embark on an epic escape adventure in "Pixi Poxi," a game that will push the boundaries of your gaming skills. Assume the role of Pixi, a courageous test subject. Your mission: to break free from the clutches of the crazy scientist, Poxi, and reclaim your lost humanity.

Try the first 10 levels in this demo!
name: Pixi Poxi Autorunner Lab Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Pixi Poxi is a challenging autorunner rage puzzle platform game that will test the limits of your gaming skills. You will accompany a test subject on their quest to escape to freedom fighting through several levels with a variety of difficulties, traps and barriers!
